sn17.37:1.2: “Daruno, bhikkhave, labhasakkarasiloko katuko pharuso antarayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya.
sn17.37:1.3: Idhaham, bhikkhave, ekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
sn17.37:1.5: Tamenam passami aparena samayena labhasakkarasilokena abhibhutam pariyadinnacittam sampajanamusa bhasantam.
sn17.37:1.6: Evam daruno kho, bhikkhave, labhasakkarasiloko katuko pharuso antarayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya.
sn17.37:1.9: Na ca no uppanno labhasakkarasiloko cittam pariyadaya thassati’ti.
